title: The Purpose Driven Life by Rick Warren
description: The Purpose Driven Life by Rick Warren The Purpose Driven Life will help you understand why you are alive and God's amazing plan for you-both here and now, and for eternity. Rick Warren will guide you through a personal 42-day spiritual journey that will transform your answer to life's most important question: What on earth am I here for? Knowing God's purpose for creating you will reduce your stress, focus your energy, simplify your decisions, giving meaning to your life, and, most important, prepare you for eternity. This recording offers a blueprint for Christian living in the 21st century-a lifestyle based on God's eternal purposes. It challenges the conventional definitions of worship, fellowship, discipleship, ministry, and evangelism. In the tradition of Oswald Chambers, Rick Warren offers distilled wisdom on the essence of what life is all about. Full of hope and challenge, The Purpose-Driven Life will be a classic treasured by generations to come. -- Also -- Do you like oldies? Check out MaxiMusic!
